'''''"Cihuacoatl of Chimeric Bone"''''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Duelist: Series I]]''. The achievements are earned by defeating the [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Yumkasaurus Warrior: Flowing Skyfire|text=Ciuhacoatl of Chimeric Bone — Once Walked With the Lord of Xibalba}} while completing challenge conditions.
